itemDescription: Baptist missionary to Cameroon and explorer of Africa

wikipedia_page.main: George Grenfell (21 August 1849, in Sancreed, Cornwall – 1 July 1906, in Basoko, Congo Free State [now the Democratic Republic of the Congo]) was a Cornish missionary and explorer.

response: * Johnston, George Grenfell and the Congo (two volumes, London, 1908).
*Missionary and explorer George Grenfell died after a bad attack of blackwater fever at Basoko on 1 July 1906.
*George Grenfell (1849-1906), explorer and BMS missionary in the Democratic Republic of the Congo
* George Grenfell (1849–1906), Cornish missionary and explorer

* George Grenfell was born on 21 August 1849, in Sancreed and was a missionary and explorer. He died of Blackwater fever on 1 July 1906, in Basoko, Congo Free State (now the Democratic Republic of the Congo).
